    • drawYouAndLorenzoBoxFT

      private void drawYouAndLorenzoBoxFT​(boolean pf, StringBuilder trackTop, StringBuilder trackCen)
      Method drawYouAndLorenzoBoxFT handles the moment the player and Lorenzo are on the same tile
      Parameters:
      pf - indicates if is a pope favour tile
      trackTop - indicates three top and three bottom cells of the tile where the player is
      trackCen - indicates three central cells of the tile where the player is

    • drawYourBoxFTSingle

      private void drawYourBoxFTSingle​(boolean pf, String centralL, String topL, StringBuilder trackTop, StringBuilder trackCen)
      Method drawYourBoxFTSingle draws a red single player's box for his pawn
      Parameters:
      pf - indicates if is a pope favour tile
      centralL - indicates Lorenzo's three central cells of the tile
      topL - indicates Lorenzo's three top and three bottom cells of the tile
      trackTop - indicates three top and three bottom cells of the tile where the player is
      trackCen - indicates three central cells of the tile where the player is

    • drawSpecialBoxFTSingle

      private void drawSpecialBoxFTSingle​(StringBuilder trackTop, String redBold, String yellowBoldBright)
      Method drawSpecialBoxFTSingle handles the moment a player is in a Pope's Favor Tile
      Parameters:
      trackTop - indicates three top and three bottom cells of the tile where the player is
      redBold - colours the player's cross in red
      yellowBoldBright - colours the pope favour tile in yellow

      marketTray - is the market matrix
      externalMarble - is the 13th marble
